description:
go.text/locale: Expanded API and fixed bug:
- Exposed functions for parsing Language, Script, Region and Currency.
- Exposed several of the internal methods for these types as well.
- Fixed bug where not all private use tags were registered due to a bug in inc.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.text/

subject: code review 12987043: go.text/locale: Expanded API and fixed bug:
